weka.classifiers.mllib

Class MLlibNaiveBayes

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.mllib.MLlibClassifier
        • weka.classifiers.mllib.MLlibNaiveBayes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.BatchPredictor, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    @SingleThreadedExecution
public class MLlibNaiveBayes
extends MLlibClassifier
    Weka wrapper classifier for the MLlib naive bayes scheme

      • learnModel

        public void learnModel(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<weka.core.Instance> wekaData,
                       weka.core.Instances headerWithSummary,
                       java.util.List<weka.filters.StreamableFilter> preprocessors,
                       CachingStrategy strategy)
                throws weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException
        Build the classifier using an RDD of Instance objects. Assumes that any numeric attributes are actually binary (i.e. only contain 1 or 0 values). Any non-binary numeric attributes will need to have already been converted to binary ones.
